steps: Contour along the outer sides of the forehead and jaw to reduce width.
Place blush slightly above the apples and sweep upward toward the temples.
Highlight the center of the face to create vertical focus.
Contour from the temples down under the cheekbones to create angles.
Place blush higher on the cheeks and blend upward.
Highlight the center of the face to add length.
Use light contour under cheekbones to maintain structure.
Apply blush on the mid-cheek and blend softly upward.
Highlight the cheekbones and center subtly.
Contour the forehead hairline and chin to reduce length.
Place blush horizontally across the cheeks.
Highlight cheekbones rather than the center.
Contour the top of the forehead and bottom of the chin.
Apply blush straight across the cheeks.
